data.homeworkTitle: （儿科护理学）第三章     儿童保健
data.remark: 按规定时间内时完成作业

questions.title: 新生儿期应接种的疫苗是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"Ａ.卡介苗","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"Ｂ.破伤风抗毒素","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"Ｃ.乙脑疫苗","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"Ｄ.百白破三联疫苗","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 接种疫苗抽吸后剩余液超过多长时间不能再用
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"Ａ.1小时","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"Ｂ.2小时","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"Ｃ.3小时","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"Ｄ.4小时","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 被动免疫免疫效果产生快，维持为
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"Ａ.10天","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"Ｂ.20天 ","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"Ｃ.30天","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"Ｄ.3周","IsAnswer":true}]

questions.title: 主动免疫的抗体持续时间久，一般为
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"Ａ.1~5年","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"Ｂ.1~3年","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"Ｃ.1~2年","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":" Ｄ. 6个月 ","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 以下哪一项是被动免疫制剂
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"Ａ.乙型脑炎疫苗","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"Ｂ.破伤风类毒素","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"C.狂犬疫苗","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"D.丙种球蛋白  ","IsAnswer":true}]

questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"Ａ.2个月时开始口服脊髓灰质疫苗 ","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"Ｂ.2~3个月接种卡介苗　","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"Ｃ.4~5个月注射麻疹疫苗 ","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"Ｄ.6~8个月注射百白破混合疫苗","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"Ａ.1周 ","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"Ｂ.2周","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"Ｃ.3周","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"Ｄ.4周","IsAnswer":true}]

questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"Ａ.隔离病人","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"Ｂ.接种卡介苗","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":" Ｃ.口服抗结核药物","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"Ｄ.禁止随地吐痰 ","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"皮下注射","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"皮内注射","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"肌内注射","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"口服","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"静脉注射","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 小儿，女，3个月，接种百白破疫苗后，当日晚间体温38。C，哭闹。护士应采取的措施是(  )
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"口服抗生素","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"氧气吸入","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"口服退热药","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"多饮水","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"注射地塞米松","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"皮下注射肾上腺素","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"吸氧","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"开通静脉通路","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"平卧保暖","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"心肺复苏","IsAnswer":true}]

questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"低血钙","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"过敏性休克","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"全身反应","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"全身感染","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"低血糖","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 某男，l0岁，自愿接种流感疫苗。接种中出现头晕、心悸、面色苍白、出冷汗。查体：T36．8℃，Pl30次／分，R25次／分，诊断为晕厥。此时，护士应为患儿采取正确的体位是(  )
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"头低位","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"头高足低位","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"侧卧位","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"俯卧位","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"平卧、头稍低","IsAnswer":true}]
